episodes.title: The Cult of the Alexanders: A Family Lost to Delusion
episodes.description: In a secluded home in 1970s Tenerife, the Alexander family’s lives took a dark turn under the oppressive rule of father Harald and his son Frank, who saw himself as a messianic figure. Mary, the devoted mother, and her daughters, who were raised to obey without question, became unwitting victims in a twisted world of delusion and control. As isolation and fanaticism deepened, the family dynamic grew more toxic—until one horrific night of violence shattered their lives forever. Join us as we delve into the chilling tale of the Alexander family murders, uncovering the fate of each member and the dangerous power of belief gone wrong.
